modName: Satyr Faun base mesh Need help
summary: A basic mesh of a Satyr! Credit to theru for legs
descriptionHtml:
I\'m trying to make Satyr equip-able legs, but need help. I made the legs larger so they reach the pelvis and are a bit thicker, but I am planning on either covering the you know what with fur, or having it hang out XD    

Any help would be greatly appreciated!

Just download the files and edit the nif

List to tick off
X=Done

Only goat legs= 
Larger goat legs=X
Nude or fur=
Male and female version=

Currently the male body is on the female mesh, so somebody could straighten that out that would be great. I am currently wanting the male version much more though!

Again, credit to theru!
author: raccoonluver676 and theru
